articles.title: About Computational Biology for All!
articles.description: Some additional details about the blog
articles.contents:
Welcome to Computational Biology for All! I'm Nathan
Brouwer, a biology lecturer at the University of Pittsburgh Department of Biological
Science. I've been using for over a decade to do and teach
statistical modeling, populations simulations, bioinformatics and
phylogenetics.

articles.title: Blogroll
articles.contents:
R-bloggers: https://www.r-bloggers.com/
Statistical
Modeling, Causal Inference, and Social Science (Andrew
Gelman et al.): https://statmodeling.stat.columbia.edu/
Armchair
Ecology: https://armchairecology.blog/
